name: CalendarDayGridHeaderCell
description:
An individual day header cell in the calendar.
Renders a `<th>` element.

formatter.description: The formatter function used to display the day of the week.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Calendar.DayGridHeaderCell.State,
  ) => ReactElement)
